message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $13,500. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $11,500. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,500. Can you consider that?
